cd:Record.name: GOME2_PCD_SPEC_SMR
cd:Record.cd:Description: Product Confidence Data record for Spectral Calibration with Fraunhofer algorithm

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Availability of previous SLS spectral calibration

cd:Array.cd:Description: Number of fitting windows for FPA and PMD channels

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Width (in pixel) of fitting windows for FPA channels

cd:Array.cd:Description: Number of windows with a converging fit for FPA channels (Levenberg-Marquardt) and PMD channels (cross-correlation)

cd:Integer.cd:Description: Number of windows filterd out for final wavelength differences fit
